sections.body:
Before Combat The cleric casts bear's endurance and stoneskin.

During Combat The cleric targets weak-looking opponents first, using spells to blind and damage multiple enemies before attacking with her greatsword.

Base Statistics Without bear's endurance and stoneskin, the cleric's statistics are

hp 95

Fort +11

DR none

Con 14.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: The profane general, a powerful cleric of war who leads by example, cleaves through enemies to inspire her allies and followers to greater glory and victory.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Cleric/Clerics/Profane General/Birn Hengdel

sections.body: Birn became a mercenary when her unit was cut off and her home city fell. Over the years, she has gathered many warriors under her banner. She lives only for battle, refusing to become attached to followers she may have to sacrifice.
Birn loyally serves whoever pays her, so she might face the PCs while in the employ of any villain.
Because she works for the highest bidder, Birn might just switch sides if given a better offer.

sections.name: Birn Hengdel

name: Profane General
skills: Diplomacy +7, Heal +11, Intimidate +4, Knowledge (engineering, nobility, planes) +6, Knowledge (history, religion) +9, Knowledge (local) +3, Perception +16, Ride –1, Spellcraft +9
